import React from'react';import'./CityInput.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";class CityInput extends React.Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.onKlickHandler=async e=>{e.persist();const eventKey=e.which?e.which:e.keyCode;const city=e.target.value;// check if input contains only letters after Enter was pressed
if(eventKey===13){if(/^[a-zA-ZäöüÄÖÜß ]+$/.test(city)){e.target.classList.add('loading');if(await this.props.makeApiCall(city))e.target.placeholder='Enter a City...';else e.target.placeholder='City was not found, try again...';}else e.target.placeholder='Please enter a valid city name...';e.target.classList.remove('loading');e.target.value='';}};}render(){const style={top:this.props.city?'-380px':'-20px',width:'600px',display:'inline-block',padding:'10px 0px 10px 30px',lineHeight:'120%',position:'relative',borderRadius:'20px',outline:'none',fontSize:'20px',transition:'all 0.5s ease-out'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"city-input",style:style,type:"text",placeholder:"Enter a City...",onKeyPress:this.onKlickHandler});}}export default CityInput;
